label: DisplayActivity
text: * Drink plenty of water especially start your day with 2 glasses of Luke warm lime water.* Include high fiber low calorie food items in your diet.* Avoid excess intake tea and coffee; instead choose for herbal and green tea.* Avoid all kind of bottled beverages and canned food items.* Avoid all kind of sweets and desserts.* Include high fiber rich vegetables fruits and avoid potatoes sweet potatoes yam and lower intake of mango banana and other sugar rich fruits.* Avoid all kind of sauces pickles cheese and butter etc.* Avoid all kind of refined wheat flour preparations e.g. noodles pastas rolls etc.* Use Multigrain flour husked or wholegrain pulses and cereals.* Do regular exercise for about 30-45 minutes a day.
